items.text: Comprehensive expertise in specialised pharmacy solutions from custom compounding to oncology and clinical trials
Collaborating with healthcare professionals and services
Unwavering commitment to medication safety and patient outcomes

aboutUs.heading: About Us
aboutUs.title: ICCC: Trusted Leaders in Advanced Pharmaceutical Solutions
content: Innovative Custom Compounding Chemist (ICCC) is your trusted partner in expert compounding and advanced pharmaceutical solutions. With over 30 years of specialised experience, we collaborate with a network of leading community and hospital pharmacies across Australia, delivering seamless logistics and professional support to ensure trusted outcomes and the highest standards of patient care.

Our team of highly skilled registered pharmacists is committed to precision, safety, and innovation in compounding, helping healthcare providers deliver tailored treatments that meet every patient's unique needs.

infoCards.title: Specialised Pharmaceutical Solutions
infoCards.subTitle: Expert Compounding. Trusted Outcomes
infoCards.description: At ICCC, we go beyond compoundingâ€”we deliver confidence, safety, and care. Every service is built on precision, compliance, and a commitment to improving patient outcomes.

one.title: Clinical Trials Management
one.content: From compounding complex investigational medicines to managing trial documentation electronically, remote monitoring features, all delivered with full GCP compliance.

two.title: Chemotherapy Compounding
two.content: Our chemotherapy compounding service delivers every dose with the highest standards of safety and precision.

three.title: Access Program Management
three.content: End to End Access Program Management, from patient registration to stock ordering and compounding

four.title: Timely Delivery Service
four.content: We understand that timely access to medication can change lives.
